00041 #include <fstream>

00044 void EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShapeFormat0(const char *fname,
00045         const string &Name,EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00046     prob=0;
00047     xpos=0;
00048     ypos=0;
00049     zpos=0;
00050     map=0;
00051     nx=0;
00052     ny=0;
00053     nz=0;
00054     nxy=0;
00055     nreg=0;
00056     type=-1;
00057     const static char *func = "EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape";
00058     otype = "voxelized_shape";
00059     if (!fname) {
00060         return;
00061     }
00062     ifstream data(fname,ios::binary);
00063     if (!data) {
00064         egsWarning("%s: failed to open file %s\n",func,fname);
00065         return;
00066     }
00067     char endian, form;
00068     data.read(&endian,1);
00069     data.read(&form,1);
00070     if (data.fail()) {
00071         egsWarning("%s: failed to read endianess and format from %s\n",func,fname);
00072         return;
00073     }
00074     if (form < 0 || form > 1) {
00075         egsWarning("%s: unknwon format %d found in file %s\n",func,(int)form,fname);
00076         return;
00077     }
00078     if (endian != egsGetEndian()) {
00079         egsWarning("%s: data in %s from a machine with different endianess.\n"
00080                    "  Byte swaping not implemented yet.\n",func,fname);
00081         return;
00082     }
00083     short snx, sny, snz;
00084     data.read((char *)&snx,sizeof(short));
00085     data.read((char *)&sny,sizeof(short));
00086     data.read((char *)&snz,sizeof(short));
00087     if (data.fail()) {
00088         egsWarning("%s: failed to read number of voxels from %s\n",func,fname);
00089         return;
00090     }
00091     if (snx < 1 || snx > 10000 || sny < 1 || sny > 10000 || snz < 1 || snz > 10000) {
00092         egsWarning("%s: number of voxels seems strange: nx=%d, ny=%d, nz=%d\n",
00093                    func,snx,sny,snz);
00094         return;
00095     }
00096     nx = snx;
00097     ny = sny;
00098     nz = snz;
00099     nxy = nx*ny;
00100     nreg = nxy*nz;
00101     egsInformation("Distribution has %d x %d x %d voxels\n",nx,ny,nz);
00102     float *x = new float [nx+1], *y = new float [ny+1], *z = new float [nz+1];
00103     data.read((char *)x, (nx+1)*sizeof(float));
00104     data.read((char *)y, (ny+1)*sizeof(float));
00105     data.read((char *)z, (nz+1)*sizeof(float));
00106     if (data.fail()) {
00107         egsWarning("%s: failed to read voxel boundaries\n",func);
00108         delete [] x;
00109         delete [] y;
00110         delete [] z;
00111         return;
00112     }
00113     int nmap;
00114     float *p;
00115     if (form == 0) {
00116         p = new float [nreg];
00117         egsInformation("Format 0, reading %d values\n",nreg);
00118         data.read((char *)p, nreg*sizeof(float));
00119         if (data.fail()) {
00120             egsWarning("%s: failed to read probabilities\n",func);
00121             delete [] p;
00122             delete [] x;
00123             delete [] y;
00124             delete [] z;
00125             return;
00126         }
00127         nmap = nreg;
00128     }
00129     else {
00130         egsInformation("Format 1, reading data\n");
00131         data.read((char *)&nmap, sizeof(int));
00132         if (data.fail() || nmap < 1) {
00133             egsWarning("%s: failed to read nmap\n",func);
00134             delete [] x;
00135             delete [] y;
00136             delete [] z;
00137             return;
00138         }
00139         map = new int [nmap];
00140         p = new float [nmap];
00141         data.read((char *)map, nmap*sizeof(int));
00142         data.read((char *)p, nmap*sizeof(float));
00143         if (data.fail()) {
00144             egsWarning("%s: failed to read probabilities and bin numbers\n",func);
00145             delete [] p;
00146             delete [] map;
00147             delete [] x;
00148             delete [] y;
00149             delete [] z;
00150             return;
00151         }
00152     }
00153     EGS_Float *p1 = new EGS_Float [nmap];
00154     int j;
00155     for (j=0; j<nmap; ++j) {
00156         p1[j] = p[j];
00157     }
00158     delete [] p;
00159     egsInformation("Making alias table\n");
00160     prob = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(nmap,p1);
00161     xpos = new EGS_Float [nx+1];
00162     ypos = new EGS_Float [ny+1];
00163     zpos = new EGS_Float [nz+1];
00164     for (j=0; j<=nx; ++j) {
00165         xpos[j] = x[j];
00166     }
00167     for (j=0; j<=ny; ++j) {
00168         ypos[j] = y[j];
00169     }
00170     for (j=0; j<=nz; ++j) {
00171         zpos[j] = z[j];
00172     }
00173     delete [] x;
00174     delete [] y;
00175     delete [] z;
00176     type = form;
00177     egsInformation("Done\n");
00178 }
00179 
00180 EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape(int file_format, const char *fname,
00181                                        const string &Name,EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseShape(Name,f),
00182     prob(0), xpos(0), ypos(0), zpos(0), map(0), nx(0), ny(0), nz(0), nxy(0),
00183     nreg(0), type(-1) {
00184     const static char *func = "EGS_VoxelizedShape::EGS_VoxelizedShape";
00185     if (file_format == 0) { // binary file format -> call original constructor
00186         string s(fname);
00187         EGS_VoxelizedShapeFormat0(s.c_str());
00188         return;
00189     }
00190     if (file_format != 1) { // unknown file format
00191         egsWarning("%s: unknown file format = %d\n",func,file_format);
00192         return;
00193     }
00194     // interfile format -> continue
00195     otype = "voxelized_shape";
00196     if (!fname) {
00197         return;
00198     }
00199     ifstream h_file(fname);
00200     if (!h_file) {
00201         egsWarning("%s: failed to open file %s\n",func,fname);
00202         return;
00203     }
00204     string data_file("");
00205     int data_type = -1;
00206     int Nx, Ny, Nz;
00207     float scale_x=0.0, scale_y=0.0, scale_z=0.0;
00208     while (1) {
00209         string line, key, value;
00210         size_t pos;
00211         getline(h_file, line);
00212         if (h_file.eof() || h_file.fail() || !h_file.good()) {
00213             break;
00214         }
00215         pos = line.find(":=");
00216         if (pos == string::npos) {
00217             continue;
00218         }
00219         key = line.substr(0, int(pos));
00220         value = line.substr(int(pos)+2);
00221         while ((key[0] == '!') || (key[0] == ' ')) {
00222             key.erase(0,1);
00223         }
00224         while (key[key.length()-1] == ' ') {
00225             key.erase(key.length()-1, 1);
00226         }
00227         while (value[0] == ' ') {
00228             value.erase(0,1);
00229         }
00230         while (value[value.length()-1] == ' ') {
00231             value.erase(value.length()-1, 1);
00232         }
00233         if (key ==  "matrix size [1]") {
00234             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nx);
00235         }
00236         else if (key ==  "matrix size [2]") {
00237             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Ny);
00238         }
00239         else if ((key ==  "number of slices") || (key ==  "number of images")) {
00240             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nz);
00241         }
00242         else if (key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [1]") {
00243             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_x);
00244         }
00245         else if (key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [2]") {
00246             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_y);
00247         }
00248         else if (key ==  "slice thickness (pixels)") {
00249             sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_z);    // ????????????????
00250         }
00251         else if (key ==  "name of data file") {
00252             data_file = value;
00253         }
00254         else if (key ==  "number format") {
00255             if ((value == "float") || (value == "FLOAT")) {
00256                 data_type = 0;
00257             }
00258             else if ((value == "unsigned integer") || (value == "UNSIGNED INTEGER")) {
00259                 data_type = 1;
00260             }
00261             else if ((value == "signed integer") || (value == "SIGNED INTEGER")) {
00262                 data_type = 2;
00263             }
00264             else {
00265                 egsWarning("%s: unrecognised 'number format' type: %s \n",func,value.c_str());
00266             }
00267         }
00268     }
00269     if (Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1 || scale_x <= 0.0 || scale_y <= 0.0 || scale_z <= 0.0 || data_file == "" || data_type == -1) {
00270         egsWarning("%s: invalid interfile header information: "
00271                    "Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d scale_x=%f scale_y=%f scale_z=%f "
00272                    "data_file='%s' number_format=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz,scale_x,scale_y,scale_z,data_file.c_str(),data_type);
00273         return;
00274     }
00275     nx = Nx;
00276     ny = Ny;
00277     nz = Nz;
00278     nxy = nx*ny;
00279     nreg = nxy*nz;
00280     egsInformation("Distribution has %d x %d x %d voxels\n",nx,ny,nz);
00281     float *x = new float [nx+1], *y = new float [ny+1], *z = new float [nz+1];
00282     scale_x /= 10.0;
00283     scale_y /= 10.0;
00284     scale_z /= 10.0; // convert to cm
00285     {
00286         int j;
00287         for (j=0; j<=nx; j++) {
00288             x[j] = -(float)nx*scale_x/2.0 + j*scale_x;
00289         }
00290         for (j=0; j<=ny; j++) {
00291             y[j] = -(float)ny*scale_y/2.0 + j*scale_y;
00292         }
00293         for (j=0; j<=nz; j++) {
00294             z[j] = -(float)nz*scale_z/2.0 + j*scale_z;
00295         }
00296     }
00297     ifstream i_file(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00298     if (!i_file) {
00299         egsWarning("%s: failed to open interfile data "
00300                    "%s\n",func,data_file.c_str());
00301         return;
00302     }
00303     int nmap = nreg;
00304     float *p = new float [nreg];
00305     if (data_type == 0) {
00306         i_file.read((char *)p, nreg*sizeof(float));
00307     }
00308     else if (data_type == 1) {
00309         unsigned short int *p_tmp = new unsigned short int [nreg];
00310         i_file.read((char *)p_tmp, nreg*sizeof(unsigned short int));
00311         for (int cc = 0; cc<nreg; cc++) {
00312             p[cc] = (float)(p_tmp[cc]);
00313         }
00314         delete [] p_tmp;
00315     }
00316     else {
00317         short int *p_tmp = new short int [nreg];
00318         i_file.read((char *)p_tmp, nreg*sizeof(short int));
00319         for (int cc = 0; cc<nreg; cc++) {
00320             p[cc] = (float)(p_tmp[cc]);
00321         }
00322         delete [] p_tmp;
00323     }
00324     EGS_Float *p1 = new EGS_Float [nmap];
00325     int j;
00326     for (j=0; j<nmap; ++j) {
00327         p1[j] = p[j];
00328     }
00329     delete [] p;
00330     egsInformation("Making alias table\n");
00331     prob = new EGS_SimpleAliasTable(nmap,p1);
00332     xpos = new EGS_Float [nx+1];
00333     ypos = new EGS_Float [ny+1];
00334     zpos = new EGS_Float [nz+1];
00335     for (j=0; j<=nx; ++j) {
00336         xpos[j] = x[j];
00337     }
00338     for (j=0; j<=ny; ++j) {
00339         ypos[j] = y[j];
00340     }
00341     for (j=0; j<=nz; ++j) {
00342         zpos[j] = z[j];
00343         egsInformation("%f ", zpos[j]);
00344     }
00345     delete [] x;
00346     delete [] y;
00347     delete [] z;
00348     type = 0;
00349     egsInformation("Done\n");
00350 }
00351 
00352 EGS_VoxelizedShape::~EGS_VoxelizedShape() {
00353     if (isValid()) {
00354         delete prob;
00355         delete [] xpos;
00356         delete [] ypos;
00357         delete [] zpos;
00358         if (type == 1) {
00359             delete [] map;
00360         }
00361     }
00362 }

00365 extern "C" {
00366 
00367     EGS_VOXELIZED_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00368             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00369         static const char *func = "createShape(voxelized shape)";
00370         if (!input) {
00371             egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func);
00372             return 0;
00373         }
00374         string fname;
00375         int err = input->getInput("file name",fname);
00376         int file_format;
00377         int err2 = input->getInput("file format",file_format);
00378         if (err) {
00379             egsWarning("%s: missing 'file name' input\n",func);
00380             return 0;
00381         }
00382         if (err2) {
00383             egsInformation("%s: 'file format' input missing. Using default 'binary'"
00384                            "file format \n",func);
00385             file_format = 0;
00386         }
00387         EGS_VoxelizedShape *shape = new EGS_VoxelizedShape(file_format, fname.c_str());
00388         if (!shape->isValid()) {
00389             delete shape;
00390             return 0;
00391         }
00392         shape->setName(input);
00393         shape->setTransformation(input);
00394         return shape;
00395     }
00396
